CustomTab.description:
The ProjectManagementTool is a custom Salesforce component that provides a centralized view and management interface for projects. It allows users to:
- Select a project they are part of from a dropdown menu - View a dashboard for the selected project, including sprints and work item boards - Customize the work item boards by adding, removing or reordering the different status stages - Create new work items directly from the boards This component aims to provide a user-friendly experience for managing projects and work items within the Salesforce platform. It is designed to improve visibility, collaboration and productivity for project teams.
CustomTab.label: PMT
